item.title: Ground Proximity Warning System (GPWS) – Advisory Callouts (Mode 6)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:
Normal altitude callouts (i.e., 100', 50', 30', 20', 10') and bank angle envelope penetration will be inoperative.

numlitem.para: Flight crew should be vigilant monitoring aircraft altitude and flight path.
Flight crew should use all systems available to include the use of autopilot, autoland, ILS, FMCS to include RNAV/GPS.
Modify Approach Briefing accordingly for the existing meteorological conditions.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "GPWS ADV CALL-OUTS (MODE 6) INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
